item.title: Building a manuscript using Bookdown
item.description: Why? This is the second post about working with Bookdown and my experience on the process (first post is here). This post focuses on how I found that was easy to compartmentalize my work and some tips I learned along the way (I will probably write about some other things in the future as well). Use “chapters” When I started working with Bookdown I was making a single document for my manuscript.
